headline: b'After Gun Control Marches, \xe2\x80\x98It\xe2\x80\x99ll Go Away\xe2\x80\x99 vs. \xe2\x80\x98We Are Not Cynical Yet\xe2\x80\x99'

headline: b'There Is a Middle Ground on Guns'

headline: b'Gun Culture Is My Culture. And I Fear for What It Has Become.'

headline: b'Remington\xe2\x80\x99s Bankruptcy Stalls Ruling in Sandy Hook Families\xe2\x80\x99 Suit'

headline: b'Vermont Legislature Passes Sweeping Gun Restrictions'

headline: b"Ted Nugent: Parkland Teens Attacking the NRA Have 'No Soul'"
snippet: b'Rocker Ted Nugent says the Florida students calling for gun control have "no soul" and are "mushy brained children."'

headline: b'They Tried to Boycott Facebook, Apple and Google. They Failed.'
